content: Blue strongly condemns Orange's unprovoked and illegal invasion of Purple. We call on Orange to immediately cease its aggression, withdraw its forces, and pursue peaceful diplomacy.

Blue is committed to supporting your defense and sovereignty. We are working urgently on a sanctions resolution against Orange and will provide further military assistance if requested.
